# numberOfVisibleItems

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of items visible in the pop-up list at any one time.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfVisibleItems: Int { get set }
```

## Related Documentation

- **numberOfItems**: The total number of items in the pop-up list.

## Setting Display Attributes

- **hasVerticalScroller**: A Boolean value that indicates if the combo box displays a vertical scroller.
- **isButtonBordered**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the combo box button displays a border.
- **intercellSpacing**: The spacing between cells in the combo box’s pop-up list.
- **itemHeight**: The height of each item in the combo box’s pop-up list.
